name: The Growth
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam with completely original music, art assets,effects, animations and code.

Team
Thomas Boyster
Lotus Lindez
Ryan Lindez
Jason McCollum

Performance Problems?

This game requires WebGL 2.0 support, which can sometimes cause issues in certain web browsers. If you have trouble running the game properly, try downloading it instead.
